duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare and analyze cash flow projections for SII technical provisions, value of new business (VNB), etc.
Support SII reporting process through preparation of materials for local and Munich Re Group audience.
Evaluate the impact of valuation assumptions and valuation model changes under SII.
Provide deep analysis of SII results, and be able to raise important issues.
Effective communication of results and knowledge transfer to various stakeholders with varying levels of knowledge of SII.
Identify and implement enhancements to our SII systems and processes.

education_certification.credential: ASA or near ASA with expectation to work towards FSA
Bachelor's degree in mathematics, quantitative discipline, actuarial science, or related field
